bibl.title: Men of Dikes and Canals: The Archaeology of Water in the Middle East. International Symposium Held at Petra, Wadi Musa
bibl.note: Le témoignage des auteurs classiques, d'Hérodote à Pline l'Ancien. - Non vidimus. Cf. APh 77 (2008) No. 15958.
JARITZ Horst, Ancient Water Installations and Dams in the Faiyum Oasis / Egypt.

Hans-Dieter BIENERT and Jutta HÄSER (Edd.), Men of Dikes and Canals: The Archaeology of Water in the Middle East. International Symposium Held at Petra, Wadi Musa (H.K. of Jordan), 15-20 June 1999 = Orient-Archäologie. 13 (Rahden, 2004) pp. 379-389, figg., cartes.
